transcript: I think identity is just a big stack of Behavioral cues that we've said because people change over time it's really a mental construct of this is how I behave and even if you want to say like I know this person what it really means is that I have a high predictive score on what this person will do or say as a result of whatever I do or say now somebody who's all over the place or super erratic do they have a unformed Identity or do I just not know enough about them maybe that has just been my litus test maybe it seems like oversimplification but for me it has been incredibly fruitful it takes a lot of the the Superstition a lot of the magic feelings and emotions and identity out Alex is a series of behaviors that's who I am
